I don't think I have enough data yet to make any conclusions, so I plan mor=
e experiments.=C2=A0 Since there are different distinct claims about what t=
he box or the recorders can do, I try to make different distinct experiment=
s for each.

Some people claim they can get the box to tell them things tha=
t the operator couldn't know, so my "whats the object" experiment is one wa=
y to examine that.=C2=A0 Some people claim the boxes can make predictions, =
so cataloging predictions and examining the results can help examine that.=
=C2=A0 If there are other claims, I will try to figure experiments based on=
 those.

--- On Sat, 8/21/10, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wr=
ote:

=C2=A0



  


    
      
      
      =C2=A0I get our last do=
gs from time to time, and used to get them via white noise=C2=A0when I firs=
t started this. Last summer some kids came down into the basement wiht the =
younger grandson, and the little yorkie barked, but "get outta here" came o=
ut, some how. 

=C2=A0
=C2=A0Yeah, I think I was too hard on RJ. I don't kn=
ow why, but testing doens't seem to work, but we get enough to prove this t=
o ourselves. It's probably a faith thing, although I'm not religious, even =
anti-religion.=C2=A0 

=C2=A0
=C2=A0F-S
=C2=A0
=C2=A0

owfireL@... included below] 

Here is a short file, where someone says,=
 "Scamp, Scamp," then Scamp barks. "yap."=C2=A0 This little dog belonged to=
 my grandma, when I was about 9 or 10 years old, he was a Manchester Terrie=
r, and lived with us for many years, and this is his bark for sure.=C2=A0 I=
'd know that bark anywhere.=C2=A0 Sorry, that I can't make it any clearer, =
I need to get one of those better ghost boxes I guess.=C2=A0=C2=A0RJ, spiri=
ts are just like us, they are not omnipresent like God,=C2=A0=C2=A0probably=
 why David doesn't want to play the guessing game, he has better things to =
do over there, and has said, they have thousands of people standing in this=
 long line waiting to get into the Heavens, and He can't just drop His job =
and go to your house to see what you have over there, He did tell me that f=
irst time what it was, and i sent it to you, but it was too late.=C2=A0 It'=
s hard for me to understand them sometimes, He was also right about that li=
ttle boy, Syler being killed, and where his body would be
 found, I don't k=
now what they did about it though. sf
